recipes.title: Mojito
recipes.about: Mix this classic cocktail for a party using fresh mint, white rum, sugar, zesty lime, and cooling soda water. Perfect for a hot day, the Mojito balances sweetness with tangy lime and refreshing mint. Experiment with the proportions to find your ideal mix.
recipes.author: Jamie

recipes.title: Tom Collins
recipes.about: Master the art of the classic Tom Collins cocktail with this refined recipe. Made with premium gin, freshly squeezed lemon juice, a dash of sugar syrup, and topped with soda water, it delivers a crisp and refreshing taste. Try experimenting with modern twists for an extra kick.
recipes.author: Jacques

recipes.title: Sex on the Beach
recipes.about: Combine smooth vodka with sweet peach schnapps and tangy cranberry juice to create a cocktail as vibrant as its name. Garnish with cocktail cherries and an orange slice to enhance both flavor and presentation. Ideal for lively summer evenings.
recipes.author: Nehi

recipes.title: Piña Colada
recipes.about: A tropical blend of rich coconut cream, white rum, and tangy pineapple juice, the Piña Colada is a vacation in a glass. Serve it blended with ice and garnish with a pineapple slice and a colorful umbrella for that authentic tropical vibe.
recipes.author: Jamie

recipes.title: Margarita
recipes.about: A timeless classic, the Margarita combines tequila, fresh lime juice, and orange liqueur, served on the rocks with a salted rim. This cocktail is both tart and refreshing, making it perfect for a lively fiesta or a relaxing evening.
recipes.author: Zyro

recipes.title: Old Fashioned
recipes.about: A nod to tradition, this cocktail is made by muddling a sugar cube with bitters, adding a splash of water, and then mixing in bourbon or rye whiskey. Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry for a smooth, sophisticated drink that stands the test of time.
recipes.author: Morningstar

recipes.title: Cosmopolitan
recipes.about: Popularized in the 90s, the Cosmopolitan features vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and freshly squeezed lime juice. Served chilled in a martini glass, this cocktail is elegant, stylish, and perfect for a night out.
recipes.author: Theos

recipes.title: Bloody Mary
recipes.about: Ideal for brunch, this savory cocktail mixes vodka with tomato juice, lemon juice, and a blend of spices. Garnish with celery, olives, or even bacon for an extra twist, making it a refreshing yet hearty choice.
recipes.author: Xamion

recipes.title: Long Island Iced Tea
recipes.about: A potent mix of tequila, vodka, rum, gin, and triple sec with a splash of cola, lemon juice, and simple syrup creates a deceptively smooth yet powerful cocktail that mimics the flavor of iced tea. Perfect for those who like a strong kick.
recipes.author: Amy

recipes.title: Mai Tai
recipes.about: This iconic tiki cocktail mixes rum, lime juice, orange curaçao, and orgeat syrup to produce a balanced tropical drink with a hint of almond, perfect for evoking beach vibes and a relaxed atmosphere.
recipes.author: Feyi

recipes.title: Daiquiri
recipes.about: A classic cocktail featuring white rum, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup, shaken until perfectly chilled and served straight up. This drink is a refreshing, tangy delight that highlights the natural flavors of its ingredients.
recipes.author: Zena

recipes.title: Sidecar
recipes.about: An elegant cocktail that blends cognac, orange liqueur, and lemon juice into a balanced mix, served in a sugar-rimmed glass for an extra touch of sophistication. Its refined flavor makes it ideal for a classy evening.
recipes.author: Trixie

recipes.title: Screwdriver
recipes.about: A simple yet classic cocktail combining vodka and freshly squeezed orange juice, ideal for a refreshing brunch or a laid-back evening. Its straightforward preparation makes it a perennial favorite.
recipes.author: Zoe
